name: yanki-obsidian
description: An Obsidian plugin for ultra-simple automated flashcard syncing from a folder in your vault to Anki. Pure Markdown syntax. Minimal configuration. No fuss.

scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist && tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && tsx ./scripts/build.ts production && pnpm run manifest
scripts.dev: rm -rf ./dist && pnpm run manifest && touch ./dist/.hotreload && tsx ./scripts/build.ts
scripts.release: pnpm run manifest && pnpm bumpp package.json manifest.json --commit "Release: %s" --tag "%s"

obsidian.description: Ultra-simple automated flashcard syncing from a folder in your vault to Anki. Pure Markdown syntax. Minimal configuration. No fuss.
obsidian.name: Yanki
